sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of DuPont ( DD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.5%.
Year to date, DuPont has lost about 7.3% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is United Technologies ( UTX ), trading down 2.0%.
United Technologies is lower by about 1.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.1%, and Visa ( V ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
